Content.Text:
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad you came, <MYNAME>!
Would you like to try playing the tune
<RED>"Rock Dance"</RED>?
Play
Don't play

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Rock Dance</RED> is:
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <RED>Do</RED> <Y_GREEN><Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN></Y_GREEN>
<GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Ready to stop playing?
Tell me the tune again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I'll tell you again!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Rock Dance</RED> is:
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <RED>Do</RED> <Y_GREEN><Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN></Y_GREEN>
<GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Play faster!
Don't be such a slowpoke!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Do you want to quit playing?
Continue playing
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now I want you to play faster!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Rock Dance</RED> is:
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <RED>Do</RED> <Y_GREEN><Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN></Y_GREEN>
<GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You played it wrong!
Come on, try it again from the top!
Try playing again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, concentrate!
<PAGE>
The tune for <RED>Rock Dance</RED> is:
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <RED>Do</RED> <Y_GREEN><Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN></Y_GREEN>
<GREEN>Fa</GREEN> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee-hee-hee-hee.
You hit the right notes!
Great performance!
<PAGE>
So we're going to give you a prize!
Go ahead, Aaron!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right!
<PAGE>
The prize you get this time is the
ability to use the <RED>mine</RED>
in the forest.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll smash open this rock for you!
Hiyaaah!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now you can go into the <RED>mine</RED>! You can
find all kinds of <GREEN>minerals</GREEN> in the
mine. Should I explain in detail?
Yes
No

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You got it! I'll explain to you inside
the mine, so let's go!
That-a-way!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay.
Just check it out for yourself later on.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good for you,  <MYNAME>.
Now you'll be able to collect lots of
minerals!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll let you know when I think of a new
tune.
I'm sure you'll be waiting eagerly!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now we're inside the mine.
Here you can dig for minerals.
Look at that, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a mining point.
Hit the point with your <GREEN>hammer</GREEN> and
minerals will come out!
<PAGE>
And you will definitely need minerals
to restore the town later on.
Good luck mining, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The amount of minerals that will come
out changes from day to day.
Mother Nature is like that!
<PAGE>
Green and red mining points can only be
mined with upgraded hammers.
Make sure you have them in your bag.
NoMsg
NoMsg
NoMsg

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
See you later, <MYNAME>.
Good luck!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll let you know when I think of a new
tune.
I'm sure you'll be waiting eagerly!
